column2: zcandyman1225, 35-44 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I've had diarrhea for the past 2 yrs, pain in the stomach was so bad. They said I had IBS too. Finally took gallbladder out but diarrhea didnt stop. Started this medicine and I have no more diarrhea after only 2 days on this stuff. I'm taking it twice a day, WOW  Its so great not having to worry about having a bathroom close by anymore. It was terrible. This stuff is great. I mix it in a small plastic soda bottle which makes it easier to mix up, start with a little water and shake then add more water and shake again, this has been the best way to mix up for me.      I've lost so much weight over the past 2 years, has anyone else had this problem? If so any suggestions on how to gain weight? Nothing is working, Im eating a lot all day long.

column9: I have dealt with chronic diahrea since I was a child. I also have had my gallbladder removed. column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)

column2: 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: while i found it difficult to dissolve the powder even after quite a lot of mixing, the taste isn't terrible... the texture is my biggest hurdle. as far as effectiveness goes, i could not be more pleased. i had my gall bladder removed and had chronic diarrhea several times a day for more than 7 months. after the first dose, it was a miracle. recently i have found that even missing one dose can be severe. if i have to be on this medication every day for the rest of my life, it is SO much better than not being able to eat in public or needing to be near a bathroom within minutes of eating.

column9: I started taking this twice a day.  I woke up after 2 days with very swollen hands and fingers.  I actually injured one of my fingers because it felt numb.  Now I'm down to once a day.
